structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Sub Employment Status Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of sub-employment status categories providing detailed breakdown of employment and unemployment characteristics following International Labour Organization (ILO) standards.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Total
structure:Code.common:Description: Total for the specified category or dimension.

structure:Code.common:Name: Full-time employed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons employed on a full-time basis, typically working 35 or more hours per week.

structure:Code.common:Name: Part-time employed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons employed on a part-time basis, typically working fewer than 35 hours per week.

structure:Code.common:Name: Permanent job
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons employed in permanent positions with no predetermined end date.

structure:Code.common:Name: Temporary job
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons employed in temporary positions with a predetermined end date or contract.

structure:Code.common:Name: Employees
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work for a public or private employer and receive remuneration in wages, salary, commission, tips, piece-rates, or pay in kind.

structure:Code.common:Name: Self employed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work on their own account or with one or more partners, holding the type of job defined as a 'self-employment job'.

structure:Code.common:Name: Family workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work without pay in an economic enterprise operated by a related person living in the same household.

structure:Code.common:Name: New unemployed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are unemployed and have been seeking work for less than 12 months.

structure:Code.common:Name: Long-term unemployed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are unemployed and have been seeking work for 12 months or longer.
